import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent implements OnInit { email!: string; isShown = false; numberOfWishes: number = 0; constructor(private router: Router, public authService: AuthService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } hideLogin(value: string) { if (value) this.email = value if (value && this.isShown) { this.isShown = !this.isShown } } }
